title: Weird Lag
body:
I came home yesterday excited for the new skins I've been eagerly waiting weeks for and was pleasantly surprised to find a friend gift me Pug'Maw. When I jumped into a game my excitement quickly turned to frustration when I discovered I was lagging. Both my ping and fps are normal and I checked my task manager to find everything running fine. Its like a weird delay on everything I do in game and randomly my character moves like as if they are slowed then they go into a speed boost to catch up to the real in game time if I had been moving for awhile. I reinstalled the game and made sure to update all of my computers divers to find no relief. I'm near certain it is caused by the new patch some how but I'm unsure and I don't know what to do. I'm close to doing a factory restore on my computer but dread doing so when considering my saved files. So before I do something crazy as such I ask, is there any known issues with the current patch?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
First of all, I'm so jealous of your Pug'Maw XD!

Back to business, this sounds like you're experiencing packet loss. Packet loss essentially means that some of the data is being lost when it's sent from your network to our servers. We can be sure of this by using our [**Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take your most recent game logs, and pop it into that reader. 

Once it's finished, post what it gives you here and we can go from there!
My last couple games were really bad and the logs for them showed no issues with minimal packet loss.
Could you post what the log reader said here so we can see what was going on?

NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: NO ISSUES

"Your average ping was 65 milliseconds, which means your ping was good overall.

The worst ping you experienced was 70ms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game."

"You had minimal packet loss during this game, meaning you had a very stable connection."

Like that for each with the ping changing around 60-70ms..

Since it seems like we can rule out packet loss, there might be a very specific issue causing these weird random champion movements. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs, and they'll be able to go much more in detail for you there.
